thread.title: Ground News - Another death reported since 2021 recall of home bed assist handles: Health Canada
thread.title_full: Ground News - Another death reported since 2021 recall of home bed assist handles: Health Canada

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Another death reported since 2021 recall of home bed assist handles: Health Canada
text:
Summary by Ground News Four models of bed handles distributed by Drive Medical were first recalled two years ago. The metal handles are affixed alongside the mattress to help people get in and out of their regular bed. The products are not designed for hospital beds. More than 68,000 of the affected handles were sold between 2016 and 2021 in Canada. Share menu More

Four models of bed handles distributed by Drive Medical were first recalled two years ago after two reported deaths — one in Canada and one in the U.S. Health Canada says as of Dec. 19, the company has received a report of a second death in this country.
